locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower: ‚Ä¶ More

Had a nice hot shower. Went for my salad, picked a good one. Went to the counter to auto pay and asked for salad dressing. Didn‚Äôt realize it was across from the salads. Nice to finally have a Pilot that lets you get your own salad dressing. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that the employees care. The fountain area was not so clean. When I got to my shower it wasn't all the way clean. The hand washing soap was empty, the toilet was loose on the floor and it has a hair line crack on it. You can actually see it ‚Ä¶

I wanted to get a hot shower on a cold windy day and got very disappointed. The water was slightly warm and the flow was very weak. I got very cold. Also the trash bins were all full and people had to leave the trash outside the trash bins. ‚Ä¶
Truck stop staff at night is terrible at night time u will always wait a 1hr to get a shower

There are just a couple of things we look for at the end of a drive day... clean hot shower (check), easy parking (check), and wifi.... nope... premium wifi here is horrible... .20 megs DL... almost as bad as dialup... my cell phones faster ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have to give a star to leave a review!  This stop would be a NEG 5 star...was waiting over an hour for a shower, not one shower was being used, they were all empty since the time I walked in.  I always try to see if they are cleaning them ‚Ä¶
Shower could use some TLC but the pressure and temperature were just right. I did not want to leave once the water hit my skin.

‚Ä¶ While waiting on a shower,  I did meander about, looking at the coffee and fountain drink area, all appeared clean and stocked.  Subway was clean and friendly.  The folks running the registers were polite and greeted most customers. ‚Ä¶

WIFI is horrible. Shower ap doesn't work. Best part.... Nasty lady working the counter told me no problems with our WiFi. I should have stayed at the Love's and paid to take a shower instead of using points of coming here. Here is a ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Lake Oasis Travel Plaza
locations.content: Lake Oasis Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: If they were open 24hrs I'd give 4 stars. Super clean, big shower with seat in it. Nice towels. No blow dryer. (Need to add a chair to sit on to get dressed) ‚Ä¶
Can't ask for better, Great restaurant,Truck parking, Shower, Coffee, and staff. Very clean and comfortable.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Been at this loves a few times ‚úÖ

So great water pressure ‚úÖ

Really hot water‚úÖ

No extra towels‚úÖ

Roof looks kinda weird ‚úÖ

Shower was pretty clean ‚úÖ

Shower has cup holders on wall ‚úÖ

Overall not a bad shower ‚úÖ

People were GREAT! Welcoming. I‚Äôm glad the actual shower was cleaned but the rest.... hair on toilet and floors. Even fingernail clippings. You have to clean the toilets!!! I should have done a video. The walls were filthy and hair in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Clean woman‚Äôs restrooms. I didn‚Äôt get a chance to shower bc I wanted to wash my clothing first after cleaning out my truck and I couldn‚Äôt. I don‚Äôt like that they don‚Äôt have a laundry room, that was my sole purpose of stopping here. Lugged ‚Ä¶
Excellent! I put on fuel, I'm going to take my ten hour break then shower in the morning.

I love stopping here for fuel and a shower. Parking fills up fairly early. Clean and organized store and friendly staff. Does not get as jammed up as other Loves on I-90/94. This Loves has clean AND sanitized shower rooms.  The last several ‚Ä¶
Staff are super nice and welcoming but the showers are gross.. ‚Ä¶

Typically no issues with this Loves but went in to shower and the shower was just filthy. The shower stall and sink areas seemed clean but there was trash and dust all over the floors where they haven't been bothering  to sweep or mop. Even ‚Ä¶

Everything thing was clean. Shower was clean an hot water. Had a tire changed Kory helped us an was friendly an efficient.  Joseph in the tire shop was rude to other tireshop employees horrible attitude

I had to do a 34 hour rest here.I used the shower the toilet looked like had not been cleaned in weeks.The bathroom was in the same shape.The toilet was not cleaned either.This falls back on management for not checking out what workers ‚Ä¶

We bought a shower and the attendant asked where our truck was parked, we said it‚Äôs on the parking lot, behind the building, then she gave us the code to shower #4. In 15 minutes, when I was showering, she started yelling outside the shower ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Kwik Trip
locations.content: Kwik Trip may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Very Nice Roomy and Clean Shower for $8...Free with Fleet Reward fuel purchase üòé üëåüèΩ
Across the street is $13 but doesn't look nice and new as this. NO SHADE ‚Ä¶

I was excited to find a kwik trip with showers as my experience with kwik trip restrooms are that they are pretty clean. Got a shower to find lots of long dark hair all over the floor of the shower, walls dirty and mold growing in both ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ trip but today not so much. Stopped for 200 Gallons of fuel and a shower and was advised the showers are not clean and they don't have time clean them and there is no eta as to when they will be cleaned. Drivers run a schedule at times and ‚Ä¶

Very clean showers! Laundry available as a reasonable price $2 wash/$2 dry. Shower was free with reward but without is $8 (cheapest in the industry). Toilet included inside shower room. Towels were thick and warm. Friendly staff.
Nice food,clean shower $8, polite people.
$8 for a shower - you can't beat that price. I've showered at some pilots that charge $12 for showers that don't look as immaculate as the one at the Kwik Trip. 2 towels and a washcloth provided
Shower üöøüòç ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Pretty decent TA, very friendly staff, showers were clean and in good order. Their washing machines are a bit expensive. They have a nice TV room and a good shop. Decent amount of truck parking outed. I'd suggest getting here early by 2:00. It was 3/4 of the way full
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Bad place, so we stopped on aug 24th. They had no showers for that day because they only had 1 person at counter and nobody available to clean showers. Besides the Manager. So I go to get a shower next morning and cannot because my shower ‚Ä¶

Dirty bathroom and empty toilet paper.  Got 1 slice of pizza for $3.99 and it was worst pizza I've ever had. Crust tasted like cardboard and pulling off the cheese and pepperoni still didn't improve it at all. Done with TA  and Petro. They ‚Ä¶

The worst TA I've ever seen, dirty bathrooms, trash everywhere, careless employees hanging at the cashier flirting with each other and vaping, I spent $1000 on diesel. at least I deserve clean truck stop, shame on you TA

locations.title: Edgerton Travel Plaza
locations.content: Edgerton Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Seems to be a decent place to stop as a driver, very large parking lot. Seems like you can always find parking here. They have a restaurant side. Didn't try it. Not sure how good it is or not. I heard they got showers, not sure what they ‚Ä¶
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

This is a good truck stop. Nice variety of foods with a hot deli. Their pizza was great. Quick service. I stopped here on my trip south and on return. Appearance-wise, the interior is a bit worn and needs a sprucing up. Bathrooms are clean, but a bit worn, also. But worth a stop anyway.
Clean place a lot of food choices good amount of parking space. I liked that it has a lot of parking abd lots are well all over

I can rate this so many ways.   Service was awesome 5.  Cleanliness 5.  Being well stocked 5.    Being the time is 445 pm and no chicken in the hot case to go -5.  Being told no more chicken today cause the cook went home -5.    It's supper time and drivers that have to keep going have eat another cold sandwich.

showerReviews.reviewText: Worms! Absolutely disgusting paid  $14 to look up while I'm taking a shower to see worms crawling on the shower wall! The quickest most uncomfortable shower of my life! Show the attendant he shook his head and said where'd that come from? L ‚Ä¶

Decent place with plenty of parking. But avoid the showers. $8 got me 1 old, threadbare towel and a washcloth but I was given a second towel on request. The shower room itself looked clean enough, but the water smells like it's being ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ driver should be hassled after a long day on the road when we run all day we're looking for parking a meal to eat and a shower not to be robbed by these truck stops that are looking for a quick buck DONOT STOP AT THIS TRUCK STOP!!!!!!!!!
Nice place good truck parking very nice people and good shower's
Shower was dirty the night cashier isn't friendly at all

locations.title: Petro Stopping Center
locations.content: Petro Stopping Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a bunch of different stuff. Clean bathrooms. Good shower rooms with decent water pressure good hot water nice and clean and spacious. But the shower rooms have no ac so it gets very very hot in there. Almost feels like you need a ‚Ä¶

This is only a review of the showers since That‚Äôs all I stopped for when I got here. Boy are they nice, obviously they are remodeled as is the whole truck stop. Not a fan of paying for parking but 2 hrs is plenty of time for me to shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to finish their 30 while you still have driving time. They have 2 hour free parking to take a shower and get your business done, pay $50 total in store (which includes tacobell. Dunkin'  showers  the blue badger grill and bar,etc).,get ‚Ä¶

This place is the worst place a been in when you try to use the shower from the ‚ùå the app You cannot use it if you go inside to use it they gonna do the same thing and you‚Äôre gonna spend 130 or  120 gallon with no shower and they charge you ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ doesn't. Its OK/ average, clean and lots of newly remodeled space. Brand new clean showers although they forgot to refill the toilet paper in mine (good thing the shower heads are hand-helds). Restaurant (Blue Badger) sucks. Long wait ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and out going. The store side and restaurant was clean. Did laundry and took showers everything was clean. Water very hot for our shower and shower room was large enough for both my husband and myself. Jennifer the cashier was ‚Ä¶
Really enjoyed remodeled shower, it's about time! Good job. Can't wait to see it when this facility gets full remodel, restaurant too.
Reviews said showers were clean. Yes they were! Water was hot and never ran out. ‚Ä¶

Garbage. Poor service, over priced and slow as Granny on a cold winter day. It took 2hrs and 2 minutes to get a shower and eat so they reward you with a $15 fee to leave the lot. Steer clear.....money grab! Stealing your $$$$ to pay for a ‚Ä¶
One of the last few clean and friendly truck stops. Clean shower,great food always great price for fuel. Bar and restaurant. Keep it in the same way guys.

showerReviews.reviewText: Best truck stop i have ever been. Everyone so nice. Shower was shining. And most things are way more cheaper than any other place.
‚Ä¶ Shower ($11) very clean and roomy, at least #3 is. ‚Ä¶
Where to start? The outside of the building was clean the store area was clean the shower was clean. The Cafe was clean and good food. Everyone I spoke with were friendly and helpful
Nice place.  Shower clean.   Good restaurant.
Excellent service. Clean shower.

locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would ‚Ä¶

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this ‚Ä¶

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn‚Äôt clean at all and from the looks of it hasn‚Äôt been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn‚Äôt cleaning them, ‚Ä¶

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles ‚Ä¶
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* ‚Ä¶
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when ‚Ä¶

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 ‚Ä¶

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶
